page.title: 26Quarries
page.content:
Of the six reported quarries in 1986 the largest reported one on Berry Hill Road is no longer used for that purpose, but has a large housing estate built on it. Ratcher Hill Quarry is owned by Mansfield Sand Company and it is turned into Fibresand for sports arenas, landscaping and equestrian events to name but a few. Mansfield Sand Company has their headquarters on Sandhurst Avenue, Mansfield and is one of the local companies to be thriving
Yvonne
